items.sentence: Do you find that your mood changes frequently in short periods of time?

Tom wants Mary to take the medication that the doctor told her to take.
Tom hopes that Mary knows that she has do what John has told her to do.
Before you criticize a man, you should always walk a mile in his shoes.
I won't be getting married this year. In fact, I may never get married.
In arithmetic, the number resulting from an addition is called the sum.
It's a small noisy apartment, but it's where I live and I call it home.
